alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 9:05PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting 25 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado, Shonto and Window Rock. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow is likely Monday and Tuesday, watch for additional statements. Snow forecast from midnight Tonight to 5 PM Sunday: Buffalo Pass 5 to 9 inches Ganado 4 to 6 inches Shonto 3 to 5 inches Window Rock 3 to 5 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
